name: A long Time (itch)
description:
A short game about clocks. Can be completed in 10 Minutes.Created for the Epic MegaJam 2020 in 7 days
It's been A long Time. The clock is ticking...

Controls
Mouse and Keyboard, more information in the game!

Why is there a tiny version?
It's the smallest size the game can get in order to be considered for the Tiny Award of the MegaJam (less than 100MB). This version has no prerequisites installers, as such it may not work on most systems. If you just want to play the game, download the Normal Version.

Recommended System Specifications for 60FPS gameplay

CPU: 4 Cores at 2.50 GHz or higher
GPU: GTX 980 or higher
RAM: 8GB

Minimum Tested System Specifications

CPU: i7 with 4 Cores at 2.80 GHz
GPU: GTX 1060 (Mobile)
RAM: 16 GB (used 100-200 MB)
The minimum tested specifications are primarily for reference.

Development System Specifications

CPU: i7 with 8 Cores at 3.60 GHz
GPU: RTX 2070
RAM: 32 GB (used 100-200 MB)
The development specifications are primarily for reference.
